text:
Thanks Zeke - I’ve tried the following formats:
• 1679616000000
• 2023-03-24T00:00:00.000Z
• 2023-03-24
But I can’t seem to get any of them work. I’m exporting the value from the code from the callback as a “Date” property, so I can copy it to a property.

If you want to include packages outside of the preloaded package set, you can use <https://webpack.js.org/|webpack> to combine your node modules and have your bundled files be your function files. This is from serverless function reference: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/data/serverless-functions/reference#preloaded-packages>
